@graph.headline: How To Use A Custom GPT To Produce Ecommerce Product Descriptions & SEO Meta Based On Top Competitors
@graph.description: A comprehensive guide on using custom GPT and AI tools to optimize ecommerce product pages for SEO, including step-by-step processes for generating product descriptions and meta information based on competitor analysis.

@graph.name: How to Optimize Ecommerce Product Pages Using Custom GPT
@graph.description: Step-by-step process to generate and update ecommerce product pages using AI tools and competitor analysis

step.name: Ensure Topical Map & Structure
step.text: Build semantically relevant categories and sub-categories with proper URL structure and internal linking

step.name: Research Product in Market
step.text: Use tools like Ahrefs or SEMrush to analyze competitors and search volume for your target product

step.name: Setup Custom GPT
step.text: Access OptizenAI Ecom Product SEO Content Optimization GPT from ChatGPT marketplace

step.name: Input Product Information
step.text: Add product URL, core keywords, product type, collection URL, and competitor URLs from SurferSEO

step.name: Generate Optimized Content
step.text: Let the GPT analyze competitors and generate SEO title, H1, meta description, and product description

step.name: Validate in SurferSEO
step.text: Paste generated content into SurferSEO editor and optimize to achieve score of 70 or above

result.name: Optimized Product Page Content
result.description: SEO-optimized product descriptions and meta information that compete with top market performers
